name: Portfolio_Wylie_Orange_Trellis_Print_Armless_Chairs_(Set_of_2)
reviews: Chair ste not as ORANGE as they appeared on picture. Other than that they wete a great buy. Very comfortable...

The chairs are great (especially for the price). The quality is probably not well suited to withstand heavy daily usage, but they look very nice as accent chairs in my office. They are also not as orange as they appear in the picture....more of a dull orange/rust color.
Bought these for my Daughters new apartment! They are just perfect!
these chairs were easy to put together and they were a great addition to my living room. they are super comfy and for the price you cant go wrong .
description: The Portfolio Home Furnishings Wylie set of 2 armless chairs features upholstery in a vibrant orange fabric with a creamy white trellis pattern. Sold as a set of 2, these chairs are designed with a slightly contoured square back, no sag springs and thick deep seat foam cushioning for extraordinary comfort.Finish: Dark espressoFrame materials: Sturdy hardwoodUpholstery color: Vibrant orange fabric with a creamy white trellis patternUpholstery materials: Poly-blend fabric (30-percent polyester, 40-percent viscose, 30-percent linen)Legs: Dark espresso finishDesigner Portfolio Collection offers unique styles to decorate your homeIdeal for small spaces, this armless chair works great in offices, bedrooms or living roomsSpacious seating for added comfortNo sag springs and thick deep seat foam cushioning for extraordinary comfortSet of 2Innovative engineering and packaging design enable upholstery to be easily assembled in the actual roomTakes less than 30 minutes to assembleInstructions and tools for assembly includedSet ships in one (1) boxEco-friendly and efficient product design uses less fossil fuel based components in construction and deliveryDimensions: Seat: 18 inches high x 22.5 inches wide x 20.5 inches deepChair: 33.5 inches high x 22 inches wide x 31 inches deepFurniture Pattern: PrintChair Type: Accent Chairs, Club ChairsMaterial: PolyesterStyle: TransitionalAssembly: Assembly RequiredChair Back Height: StandardColor: OrangeStyleTransitionalMaterialPolyesterChair TypeAccent Chairs, Club ChairsAssemblyAssembly RequiredChair Back HeightStandardColorOrangeFurniture PatternPrint
